properties.entry: INSERT /*com.devs.honddoni.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#registNewMember()*/ INTO TBL_MEMBER A ( A.MEMBER_NO ,A.MEMBER_ID ,A.MEMBER_PASSWORD ,A.MEMBER_NAME ,A.MEMBER_BIRTH ,A.MEMBER_GENDER ,A.MEMBER_ADDRESS ,A.MEMBER_NICKNAME ,A.MEMBER_PHONE ,A.MEMBER_EMAIL ,A.MEMBER_STATUS ,A.MEMBER_PROFILE ,A.MEMBER_ACCESS ,A.MEM_REGIST_DATE ,A.MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE ,A.MEM_CHARACTER_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,DEFAULT ,'1' ,DEFAULT ,? ,NULL ,? )
SELECT /*com.devs.honddoni.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#idDuplCheck()*/ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#searchById()*/ C.* FROM TBL_MEMBER C WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#modifyPassword()*/ TBL_MEMBER E SET E.MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE E.MEMBER_ID = ?
DELETE /*com.greedy.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#writtenCommentsUser()*/ FROM TBL_MEMBER I WHERE I.MEMBER_ID = ?
